Package Models

Class Theatre

java.lang.Object
Models.Theatre
public class Theatre extends Object
Theatre associated to Cineplex. Contains theatre ID, Cineplex code and Theatre Class

  • Constructor Details

    • Theatre

      public Theatre(int theatreId, String cineplexCode, Show.TheatreClass theatreClass, int isBusy)
      Constructor for Theatre
      Parameters:
      theatreId - Theatre ID of particular theatre
      cineplexCode - Cineplex code of associated Theatre
      theatreClass - Enumerated variables for Theatre Classes. Consists of STANDARD, PLATINUM and DEFAULT
      isBusy - Status of whether the theatre i.e. whether it is showing movie currently

      public int getStatus()
      Getter method for cinema status
      Returns:
      return status of cinema. 1 represents busy and 0 represents not busy

    • getTheatreClass

      public Show.TheatreClass getTheatreClass()
      Getter method for Cineplex code
      Returns:
      returns theatre class in enumerated format. Consists of STANDARD, PLATINUM and DEFAULT

      Setter method for theatre class code

      public void setStatus(int isBusy)
      Setter method for status of theatre
